name: FPS (Aim trainer)
description:
FPS (Aim Trainer) is a game developed to improve your skills in First Person Shooters.

the skills it will improve are aim, movement etc

some remarkable features of the game

  • Based on material tensile strength
  • Decent graphics and high-quality textures
  • gamepad support
  • Zombie mode
  • custom skins
  • many attachments
  • HD models and animations
  • bullet penetration
  • physics

Install Instruction

  1. download a file archiver like Win.rar
  2. Right click > Extract Here
  3. Double click on the file "FirstPersonShooterKit" with a U logo and then the game will start
